headline: 3M Rises 40.2% in a Year and Outpaces Industry: Should You Buy the Stock Now?
summary: MMM has soared 40.2% in a year, but high debt, soft retail demand and a stretched valuation temper near-term upside.

headline: 3M: Back To Pre-Pandemic Valuations - Renewed Growth Ahead
summary: 3M's bottom has materialized during the worst of the April 2025 meltdown, as bulls defend its ongoing transformation efforts. Click to read why MMM is a Buy.
